channel.title: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents
channel.description: Alright so basically I have decided to use a pi source and basically when I first opened it I realized that the donator rank was not coded in, so I added it in and then I noticed that I couldn't put it down as 1 because rank 1 was moderator and I would have to put it to 4, which would allow a donator to do all ranks that a owner could do, so basically my question is how could I change players rights 1 to equal donator instead of moderator and so on.

item.title: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents
item.dc:creator: @PuffyVawter PuffyVawter
item.description:
@PuffyVawter wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:521881”][quote author=PuffyVawter link=topic=640391.msg4315401#msg4315401 date=1371411657]

Usually client.java in your client
[/quote]Do you know what I should look for?

There’s like 15 things you need to look for.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/348186-renamed-adding-custom-crowns-detailed-all-chat-types-rewritten-conventi.html
^That is to add like 15 ranks to a server, but you can use the data from it to edit yours.[/quote]Thanks man.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents

item.title: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“PuffyVawter, post:6, topic:521881”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640391.msg4315389#msg4315389 date=1371411134]
Usually client.java in your client
[/quote]Do you know what I should look for?[/quote]
There’s like 15 things you need to look for.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/348186-renamed-adding-custom-crowns-detailed-all-chat-types-rewritten-conventi.html
^That is to add like 15 ranks to a server, but you can use the data from it to edit yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents
item.dc:creator: @PuffyVawter PuffyVawter
item.description:
@PuffyVawter wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:521881”]Well. You need to edit the client side to change when a rank appears. In each chat type (like private messaging, clan chat, public, yell, etc) they have a variable set that if this is equal to a number, then this item shows.
You have to change that manually.[/quote] What file would I have to go to change it?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents

item.title: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well. You need to edit the client side to change when a rank appears. In each chat type (like private messaging, clan chat, public, yell, etc) they have a variable set that if this is equal to a number, then this item shows.
You have to change that manually.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents

item.title: Changing the numbers on what a rank represents
item.dc:creator: @Devastor Devastor
item.description:
@Devastor wrote:

I suppose :
1 = donator
2 = moderator
3 = admin
4 = owner

Read full topic
